Formula1 Website

This is Formula1 and it is magical!

Formula1 Teams
  • Scuderia Ferrari
  • Redbull Racing
  • Mercedes AMG Petronas
  • Mclaren
  • Scuderia AlphaTauri
Scuderia Ferrari

"Aerodynamics are for people who can't build engines."

  • First entry into Formula1 : 1950 Monaco Grand Prix
  • Notable drivers:
    • Michael Schumacher
    • Niki Lauda
    • Fernando Alonso


Redbull Racing

"It's the fear of failure that drives all of us at Red Bull."

  • First entry into Formula1 : 2005 Australian Grand Prix
  • Notable drivers:
    • Sebastian Vettel
    • Daniel Ricciardo
    • Max Verstappen


Mercedes AMG Petronas

"We'll succeed when everyone delivers their tenth of a second."

  • First entry into Formula1 : 1954 French Grand Prix
  • Notable drivers:
    • Juan Manuel Fangio
    • Nico Rosberg
    • Lewis Hamilton


Mclaren

"Life is measured in achievement, not in years alone."

  • First entry into Formula1 : 1966 Monaco Grand Prix
  • Notable drivers:
    • Ayrton Senna
    • James Hunt
    • Mika Hakkinen


Scuderia AlphaTauri

"Never lift. Never stop believing."

  • First entry into Formula1 : 2006 Bahrain Grand Prix
  • Notable drivers:
    • Giancarlo Fisichella
    • Daniil Kvyat
    • Pierre Gasly
